sentences.cn: 许多基本单位，前面有一个报警按钮触发报警(尽管你很可能会使用你的个人报警按钮)和一个取消按钮，取消意外报警电话。

sentences.c: She began to forget meetings, sleep past her alarm, accidentally forward highly personal emails to her boss.
sentences.cn: 她开始忘记开会，睡过了头，不小心把高度个人化的电子邮件发给她的老板。

sentences.c: Admissions officers read every personal statement that arrives.
sentences.cn: 招生人员会阅读收到的每一份个人陈述。

sentences.c: The most important part of the application is the much feared personal statement.
sentences.cn: 申请过程中最重要的一项，也是最令人畏惧的一项就是个人陈述。

sentences.c: By the 1950s, most schools required a brief personal statement of why the student had chosen to apply to one school over another.
sentences.cn: 到了20世纪50年代，大多数学校都要求学生提供一份简短的个人陈述，说明为什么选择申请这所学校。

sentences.c: Do you have a personal trainer?
sentences.cn: 你有私人教练吗？

sentences.c: She went to the gym with her personal trainer.
sentences.cn: 她和她的私人教练一起去了健身房。

sentences.c: I'll be your personal trainer.
sentences.cn: 我将成为你的私人教练。

sentences.c: They were cut off for not paying their phone bill.
sentences.cn: 他们未付电话费，被停机了。

sentences.c: Please ask permission from whoever pays the phone bill before making your call.
sentences.cn: 打电话前请先征得话费支付人的许可。

sentences.c: She had run up a huge phone bill.
sentences.cn: 她已经欠下了一大笔电话费。

sentences.c: A letter attached to a photocopy of a Mother Jones article from 1978 describes the newsmagazine as a "locally-produced scandal sheet published by a dissident group".
sentences.cn: 《琼斯母亲》杂志1978年的一篇文章的复印件上附有一份信函，信中将该新闻杂志称为“由异议团体出版的地方花边新闻杂志”。

sentences.c: Readers must use the original article as published in Nanyang Siang Pau for redemption. Any photocopy of the article is not allowed.
sentences.cn: 读者须使用刊登在《南洋商报》的正版万能文宣以进行兑换。任何复印文宣一律不获接受。

sentences.c: You should not photocopy it, show it to another person without approval from the editorial office, or discuss your evaluation and recommendations with the author or any other person.
sentences.cn: 不得复印，未经编辑部同意，不得向他人展示，不得就评价和建议与作者或他人进行讨论。

sentences.c: They are physical activities.
sentences.cn: 它们是体育活动。

sentences.c: If you desire physical activities, you can choose activities from swimming to horse riding.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢体育活动，你可以选择游泳、骑马等活动。

sentences.c: Doing a lot of physical activities and having a healthy diet will help have normal body weight.
sentences.cn: 进行大量的体育锻炼并保持健康的饮食习惯有助于拥有正常体重。

sentences.c: Many traditional summer school programs offered physical education, breakfast, and lunch.
sentences.cn: 许多传统的暑期学校项目提供体育课、早餐和午餐。

sentences.c: Usually, I don't spare time for exercise, but I value the physical education class at school.
sentences.cn: 通常，我不会花时间来做运动，但是我很重视学校的体育课。

sentences.c: Team games should be an essential ingredient of physical education in the national curriculum.
sentences.cn: 团队运动应该成为国家体育课程中的重要组成部分。

sentences.c: People also react in surprising ways to their physical surroundings.
sentences.cn: 人们对周遭物理环境的反应也不尽相同。

sentences.c: Make sure that the people around you and your physical surroundings support your goals.
sentences.cn: 确保你周围的人与你的周围现实支持你的目标。

sentences.c: However, there is another significant aspect of environment as the physical surroundings where most species originated and evolved.
sentences.cn: 不过，就大多数物种在其中得以产生及演化的天然外界环境而言，它还有另一个值得注意的方面。

sentences.c: Physical therapy is an important adjunct to drug treatments.
sentences.cn: 物理治疗是对药物治疗的重要补充。

sentences.c: It provided her with physical therapy.
sentences.cn: 它为她提供了物理治疗。

sentences.c: At Ohio State University, admission into the physical therapy program is intensely competitive.
sentences.cn: 在俄亥俄州立大学，物理治疗项目的录取竞争非常激烈。

sentences.c: Which of the following pie chart can explain Heppel's discovery?
sentences.cn: 下面哪个饼图可以解释赫佩尔的发现？

sentences.c: According to the pie chart above, half of the students love science books.
sentences.cn: 根据上面的饼状图，有一半的学生喜欢科学类书籍。

sentences.c: That's the pie chart you see above.
sentences.cn: 那就是你在上面看到的饼状图。

sentences.c: Then I went into a section decorated like a traditional Chinese study, with two beautiful Chinese paintings of a pine tree and some bamboo hung on the wall.
sentences.cn: 然后我进入了一个装饰得像中国传统书房的区域，里面挂着两幅美丽的中国画，画的是一棵松树和一些竹子。

sentences.c: The red rose asked the pine tree what the birds were doing.
sentences.cn: 红玫瑰问松树，鸟儿在干什么。

sentences.c: Now imagine a pine tree with all those little densely packed needles.
sentences.cn: 现在（大家）想象一棵布满了密密麻麻的小针叶的松树。

sentences.c: It was his fourth pink slip in two years.
sentences.cn: 这是他在两年内收到的第四份解雇通知书。

sentences.c: I feel so sorry for her. She just got her pink slip.
sentences.cn: 我真为她难过，她刚收到解雇通知书。

sentences.c: Receiving a pink slip may not be as bad as you think.
sentences.cn: 收到解雇通知书可能并不像你想的那么糟。

sentences.c: Will you be able to come in on Friday for an interview and placement test?
sentences.cn: 你可以在星期五来面试和参加一个分级试吗？

sentences.c: What do you think of the oral test on computer during the English placement test?
sentences.cn: 你如何看待英语分级考试中口语采用机试？

sentences.c: Do a quick test, such as the quick Placement test produced by Oxford University press?
sentences.cn: 做个快速测验，例如牛津大学出版社出版的QUICK PLACEMENT TEST(快速编班测试)。

sentences.c: Fortunately for the planet, social science and behavioural economics may be able to do that for us.
sentences.cn: 对地球来说幸运的是，社会科学和行为经济学或许可以为我们做到这一点。

sentences.c: In the relatively new science of planet hunting, no find is more prized than finding a planet like ours, one that could support life.
sentences.cn: 在行星搜寻这门新兴的科学中，如果能找到像我们地球一样能孕育生命的行星，那将是最大的发现。

sentences.c: And the Mars Science Laboratory, a car-sized rover that will explore the red planet.
sentences.cn: 还有火星的科学研究室，一个普通车大小的采集车将探索那个红色星球。

sentences.c: Amy recently won an award from the Help Save Our Planet Society.
sentences.cn: 最近艾米得到一个由“帮助拯救我们的行星社会”颁发的奖。

sentences.c: Yes, we're talking about the utter collapse of the entire basis by which every society has ever existed on the planet.
sentences.cn: 没错，这儿说的正是每个存在在这星球上的社会中，最基本的东西的崩塌。

sentences.c: A confirmed message from another civilization would utterly transform society, taking the planet on an unprecedented journey into the unknown.
sentences.cn: 来自外星社会的信息将从根本上改变我们的社会，并带领我们的星球走上一条不可预知的旅程。

sentences.c: Finally, the Product Owner prepares for the sprint-planning meeting.
sentences.cn: 最后，产品负责人要针对sprint计划会议做准备工作。

sentences.c: The team holds a sprint Planning meeting at the start of each sprint.
sentences.cn: 在每一个迭代的开始，团队都要举行一次Sprint Planning会议。

sentences.c: An iteration starts with an iteration planning meeting that is a few hours long.
sentences.cn: 迭代也起步于时长为几个小时的迭代计划会议。

sentences.c: Test of fertilizer-applying in arid hillside jujube close planting garden shows that the effect of 3 times fertilizer applying is the best.
sentences.cn: 黄土丘陵区旱坡地枣树密植园施肥试验表明，施肥3次效果最好。

sentences.c: Recently much of their energy has gone into planting a large vegetable garden.
sentences.cn: 最近，他们的大部分精力已经花在种植一个大型蔬菜园上。

sentences.c: How about planting a vegetable garden?
sentences.cn: 种个菜园怎么样？

sentences.c: The organs are kept in sealed plastic bags.
sentences.cn: 这些器官保存在密封塑料袋里。

sentences.c: A woman picks them up and seals them in plastic bags.
sentences.cn: 一位女士拣起它们，然后把它们封入各塑料袋中。

sentences.c: People don't use plastic bags in Italy.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，人们不使用塑料袋。

sentences.c: It's easy to recycle plastic, just take it to your local plastic collection point.
sentences.cn: 塑料杯的回收很简单，把它放到当地塑料制品回收点就可以了。

sentences.c: Councils would maximize the opportunities for recycling by providing at least five different types of bins for collection of glass, paper, plastic, cardboard and (waste) food.
sentences.cn: 各地议会至少会提供五个分类垃圾桶来收集玻璃、纸张、塑料、纸板以及食物废料等不同类别的垃圾，以便将垃圾废品的循环再利用率最大化。

sentences.c: Rhodes brought her doctor husband and a plastic food container rattling with heavy necklaces, bracelets and watches from her own collection and that of her late mother.
sentences.cn: Rhodes带来了她作医生的丈夫和一个塑料饭盒，饭盒里满是她已故母亲以及自己收藏的沉甸甸的项链，手镯和手表。

sentences.c: He spends most of his pocket money on PlayStation games.
sentences.cn: 他将大部分的零花钱花在买游戏站的游戏上。

sentences.c: When you give kids pocket money make sure they save some of it.
sentences.cn: 给孩子们零花钱时，你一定要确保他们攒下一部分。

sentences.c: They earned themselves a little pocket money by selling cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 他们靠卖香烟赚点零用钱。

sentences.c: Why can't you ever see my point of view?
sentences.cn: 你怎么老不明白我的观点呢？

sentences.c: I have some sympathy with this point of view.
sentences.cn: 我对这一观点有些赞同。

sentences.c: I managed to swing them round to my point of view.
sentences.cn: 我设法使他们转而接受了我的观点。

sentences.c: We were in a poor area, with no houses in sight.
sentences.cn: 我们在一个贫困地区，看不到房子。

sentences.c: You grew up in a very poor area.
sentences.cn: 你生长在相当贫困的地区。

sentences.c: My hometown is not the well-known poor area that it was.
sentences.cn: 我的家乡不再是以前那样的贫苦区了。

sentences.c: We are having a pop test.
sentences.cn: 我们将进行一场突然性测试。

sentences.c: It doesn't make sense to have a stack that pushes but doesn't pop, so you test the methods together as part of the contract the stack exposes to its client.
sentences.cn: 拥有可以推动但不能弹出的堆栈没有任何意义，因此，您可以将这些方法作为堆栈暴露给其客户机的契约的一部分进行测试。

sentences.c: Again, test the namespace using the pop-up menu on the namespace.
sentences.cn: 再次使用名称空间上的弹出菜单测试名称空间。

sentences.c: Family planning experts worry in particular about the future population explosion in Sub-Saharan Africa.
sentences.cn: 计划生育专家特别担心撒哈拉以南非洲地区未来的人口出现激增。

sentences.c: During the industrial revolution and population explosion of the 19th and 20th centuries, the demand for water rose dramatically.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪和20世纪的工业革命和人口激增期间，人们对水的需求急剧上升。

sentences.c: Additional social stresses may also occur because of the population explosion or problems arising from mass migration movements—themselves made relatively easy nowadays by modern means of transport.
sentences.cn: 由于人口的猛增或大量人口流动（现代交通工具使这种流动相对容易）造成的种种问题也会对社会造成新的压力。

sentences.c: The area has seen a rapid population growth.
sentences.cn: 这个地区人口快速增长。

sentences.c: Population growth is decreasing by 1.4% each year.
sentences.cn: 人口增长每年下降1.4%。

sentences.c: Most Middle Eastern countries have extremely high rates of population growth.
sentences.cn: 大部分中东地区的国家都有着极高的人口增长率。

sentences.c: Zookeepers said they now have a population of 80 red-eared turtles and that they were forced to build a new enclosure for the dozen estuarine crocodiles found last month.
sentences.cn: 动物园管理员说，园内现有80只红耳龟，他们不得不修建新的围栏用来圈养数十只上月被发现河口鳄鱼。

sentences.c: The parting from his sister had a positive effect on John.
sentences.cn: 和姐姐的分开对约翰有积极的影响。

sentences.c: Belt and Road Initiative will have a very positive effect on the world.
sentences.cn: “一带一路”倡议将对世界产生非常积极的影响。

sentences.c: Doing homework exerts a positive effect on kids' personality development.
sentences.cn: 做家庭作业对孩子的个性发展有积极的影响。

sentences.c: What are the possible causes of stress and obesity Zoo-raised elephants generally suffer from?
sentences.cn: 动物园中饲养的大象遭受压力和肥胖的可能的原因是______________。

sentences.c: Possible causes for the setbacks include stress the children experience as result of seeing their parents blaming each other for the divorce or arguing about custody.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子看到自己的父母闹离婚，争夺抚养权，他们内心会承受巨大的压力，因而学习成绩下滑厉害。

sentences.c: The reasonable mining design should avoid and relieve the stress as far as possible the high degree of concentration and has because the stress to elevate the danger which causes.
sentences.cn: 合理的开采设计应尽量避免和解除应力的高度集中和发生因应力升高而引起的危险。

sentences.c: That sounds like a bad deal for the power company, but it's not.
sentences.cn: 对电力公司来说，那听起来像是一笔糟糕的交易，但其实它不是。

sentences.c: They are sort of like the power company of the Internet.
sentences.cn: 他们就像是互联网的能源站。

sentences.c: If he's not a plumber, he'll work at the power company or maybe BellSouth.
sentences.cn: 如果不是水管工，在电力公司或者贝尔南方工作也行。

sentences.c: The monument is the most early practical material on all her life.
sentences.cn: 此碑是目前所见最早考证木兰生平的实物资料。

sentences.c: Wide spread use of written language would not have been possible without some cheap and practical material to write on.
sentences.cn: 广泛使用的书面语言是不可能一些廉价和实际材料，写上。

sentences.c: Solidtop solid surfaces are an advanced composite of aluminum-tri-hydrate and methyl methacrylate (MMA) developed as a practical material for living.
sentences.cn: 秀丽台实体面材是一种先进的高分子复合材料，主要成分是甲基丙烯酸甲酯（ MMA ）和氢氧化铝填充物。

sentences.c: We need people with practical skills like carpentry.
sentences.cn: 我们需要有木工等实用技术的人。

sentences.c: The MSc curriculum should prepare students for their professional career by allowing them to focus on acquiring practical skills through projects.
sentences.cn: 理科硕士课程应该通过让学生做项目来获取专业技能，为以后的职业生涯做好充足准备。

sentences.c: In addition to practical skills, Pruitt's lessons teach teamwork, encourage self-worth, and promote feelings of community.
sentences.cn: 除了实用技能，普鲁伊特的课程还教授团队合作，鼓励自我价值，并促进社区感情。

sentences.c: Marble is a precious stone.
sentences.cn: 大理石是一种珍贵的石料。

sentences.c: The precious stone is diamond.
sentences.cn: 这种贵重的石头就是钻石。

sentences.c: One is topaz, the precious stone and the other is truffle itself.
sentences.cn: 其一是黄玉本身，是一种宝石，而另一种则是块菌。

sentences.cn: 演讲技巧对你来说有多重要？

sentences.c: We train our agency leaders to enhance their presentation skills.
sentences.cn: 我们培训公司的管理层以增强其表达技巧。

sentences.c: I start by telling my story of how developing presentation skills has enriched my career.
sentences.cn: 我会从讲述一个提高演讲技巧是如何对我事业带来提升的故事开始。

sentences.c: Go ahead and give it a try with your previous data set.
sentences.cn: 继续并尝试使用以前的数据集。

sentences.c: And wherever you added new data to it, you had to make a link to some previous data.
sentences.cn: 只要向其中添加新数据，就必须添加一个与某些已有数据的链接。

sentences.c: 'r +' indicates that you'll read from and write to (erasing any previous data) the file.
sentences.cn: ' r + '表示对文件进行读写操作(删除以前的所有数据)。

sentences.c: On the contrary, if there is no claim in the previous insurance year, the insurance company would reduce the policy-holder's renew premium.
sentences.cn: 反之，如果上一保险年度没有发生索赔，保险公司将降低投保人的续期保费。

sentences.c: This generalizes the previous result.
sentences.cn: 这一点推广了以前的结果。

sentences.c: This is multiplied with the previous result to get 24.
sentences.cn: 它与前一个结果的乘积为24。

sentences.c: Her best previous result at Indian Wells was a fourth round in 2006.
sentences.cn: 2006年她在印第安韦尔斯网球赛上的最好表现是赢得了第四名。

sentences.c: But compared with previous studies, she finds the speed of breaking down in this one exciting.
sentences.cn: 但是与之前的研究相比，她发现这项研究的破解速度令人兴奋。

sentences.c: Some previous studies have suggested that challenging your brain with mentally stimulating activities might help.
sentences.cn: 先前的一些研究表明，参与心理刺激的活动来挑战你的大脑可能会有所帮助。

sentences.c: Previous studies on CSR have had trouble differentiating these effects because consumers can be affected by all three.
sentences.cn: 以前关于企业社会责任的研究在区分这些影响时遇到了困难，因为消费者可能会同时受到这三种影响。

sentences.c: Will you please send us your price list or catalog?
sentences.cn: 请把你们的价格表或目录寄给我们好吗？

sentences.cn: 根据价格表，他们花了45元买门票。

sentences.c: Here is our price list.
sentences.cn: 这是我们的价目表。

sentences.c: Ten such packs are held on a litho-printed card hanger.
sentences.cn: 十年如包举行岩性印卡衣架。

sentences.cn: 我打开一个有拉链的口袋看到一张卡片写着一些英文：“美国经典。”

sentences.cn: 有人在社交媒体上称，他亲眼目睹一位女士在牛津广场收到一个年轻男子给她的卡片后默默流泪，卡片上印有“你是个胖子”字样。

sentences.cn: 他曾写过7卷的布洛克藏品目录，因而相信伯纳姆无需昂贵的印刷目录就可以完成该工作。

sentences.c: Based on an online store with catalogue, shopping basket, approval processes and all the rest, it allows the most diverse printed products to be customised.

sentences.c: It has no private bathroom or kitchen.
sentences.cn: 那里没有私人浴室或者厨房。

sentences.cn: 所有房间都有自用洗手间。

sentences.cn: 所有房间都配备了私人浴室。

sentences.c: They were trespassing on private property.
sentences.cn: 他们正在擅自闯入私人领地。

sentences.cn: 他们想要对私人财产更多国家控制。

sentences.cn: 我父母把我送到了一所阔气的私立学校。

sentences.cn: 华盛顿的一所小型私立学校已经在这样做了。

sentences.cn: 最近有新闻媒体报道了关于“白人充门面”即用白种人来粉饰门面的新闻。

sentences.c: Collaborative Optimization based on approximate technology is applied to plane wing design.
sentences.cn: 将本文研究的基于近似技术的协同优化方法应用在机翼设计中。

sentences.c: But at a glance, the efficient wing design and engines appear to be holding up their end of the deal.
sentences.cn: 粗看之下，更有效的机翼与发动机设计保证了公司有效的实现他们的目标。

sentences.c: The main problems include general design of towed system, controllable wing design and intergration of optical sensors.
sentences.cn: 着重解决的问题包括拖曳系统的总体设计、控制翼的设计以及光学类传感器的集成。

sentences.c: You could withdraw cash from ATM with your credit card.
sentences.cn: 您可以用信用卡直接从atm机中提取现金。

sentences.c: That means it may only be a matter of time before mobile phones are used to deposit, transfer and withdraw cash.
sentences.cn: 那就意味着移动电话被用作取款，转账和提款来使用，只是时间的问题。

sentences.c: Credit card allows you to withdraw cash at any ATM machine around the world, rent a car, make purchases, book reservations.
sentences.cn: 你可以用信用卡在世界任何一台自动取款机上提取现金，租车、购物、预订服务。

sentences.c: The narrative features in The Woman Warrior that is the masterpiece written by a famous Chinese-American woman author are distinctive.
sentences.cn: 著名美国华裔女作家汤亭亭的代表作《女勇士》的叙述特色极为鲜明。

sentences.c: London, England: a woman poses with Jasper Johns's Flag, and Femme et Filettes (woman and Children) by Pablo Picasso, both part of late-author Michael Crichton's collection on display at Christie's.
sentences.cn: 英国，伦敦：一位女士从迈克尔·克莱顿在克里斯蒂拍卖行展出的收藏品毕加索的妇女与儿童与贾斯伯·约翰的国旗这两幅画旁走过。

sentences.c: Some people have said Prisca may be the author of this letter, maybe a woman has actually written one piece of our New Testament after all.
sentences.cn: 有些人说百基拉可能是这书信的作者，也许某个女人真的写了，新约中的一章。

word: wood should be cut and seasoned

sentences.c: In the idealized version of how science is done, facts about the world are waiting to be observed and collected by objective researchers who use the scientific method to carry out their work.
sentences.cn: 在科学实践的理想化版本中，世界的真相正等待客观的研究人员观察和收集，这些研究人员用科学的方法进行工作。

sentences.c: All the safety stuff, all this understanding of how nuclear power plants work is very important but the objective is to make electricity.
sentences.cn: 所有的安全材料，所有这些理解，核能电站如何运作是非常重要的，但是目标是制造电。

sentences.c: They have to work together as a team to accomplish the group's objective.
sentences.cn: 他们需要以团队的形式一块儿工作来实现小组的目标。

sentences.c: So where is the work place of that American company?
sentences.cn: 那么那个美国公司的工作地点在什么地方？

sentences.c: And every work place has quirky people.
sentences.cn: 每个工作的地方都有古怪的人。

sentences.c: Do you see any other trends in the work place?
sentences.cn: 你看过别的趋势在工作的地方吗？

sentences.c: In other disciplines, it's taken for granted that engineers work systematically.
sentences.cn: 在其他的学科，工程师们系统性的进行工作已经受到了认可。

sentences.c: Good interpersonal communication skills, with strong sense of responsibility and team-spirit, work systematically and precisely.
sentences.cn: 善于人际沟通，责任感强、有团队意识，工作精确有条理。

sentences.c: Therefore, following the higher education reform policy, we should construct the assets managing work systematically by using modern information technology to achieve progress.
sentences.cn: 本文分析了学校资产管理系统的开发背景，对学校资产管理系统的开发趋势进行调研分析后对本文主要工作进行说明。

sentences.c: Dubai is going to hold the World Expo this year.
sentences.cn: 迪拜今年要举办世博会。

sentences.c: The World Expo is a global fair for people to develop business and share innovation.
sentences.cn: 世博会是人们拓展商业、共享创新的全球盛会。

sentences.c: The Shanghai World Expo will open soon.
sentences.cn: 上海世博会即将拉开帷幕。

sentences.c: He was attacked by wild animals.
sentences.cn: 他被野兽袭击了。

sentences.c: They lit a fire to keep off wild animals.
sentences.cn: 他们点燃篝火防止野兽靠近。

sentences.c: Protecting wild animals is protecting ourselves.
sentences.cn: 保护野生动物就是保护我们自己。

sentences.c: "What a dump!" Christabel said, standing in the doorway of the youth hostel.
sentences.cn: 克丽丝特布尓站在青年旅舍的门口说道：“真是个肮脏的地方！”

sentences.c: PENNY:" I have just arrived in Scotland and I'm staying at a Youth Hostel."
sentences.cn: 彭妮：“我刚到苏格兰，我现住在一家青年招待所。”

sentences.c: Options vary hugely, and you can find anything from the large and upscale Rydges Hotel to the basic YHA youth hostel.
sentences.cn: 在这里你有很多选择，包括从宏大而高档次的雷杰斯酒店到普通的青年旅社。

sentences.c: We own your name and address to the Commercial Counselor's Office of... Embassy in...
sentences.cn: 承蒙驻…的…大使馆商务参赞处告知你方的名称和地址。

sentences.c: He explained the yellow fever epidemic as a providential act to discourage urban growth.
sentences.cn: 他对黄热病疫情对城市化进程的阻碍为一种巧合做出了解释。

sentences.c: The floods in Swat and the Indus valley are, like the yellow fever mosquitoes of the Netherlands, an indication that things could get worse.
sentences.cn: 斯瓦特和印度河流域的洪水就像荷兰的黄热病蚊子一样，是形势可能恶化的象征。

sentences.c: There is no cure for yellow fever.
sentences.cn: 对黄热病没有治疗方法。

sentences.c: A case in point is Ivy, 57, a pioneer in investment banking.
sentences.cn: 57岁的艾薇就是一个很恰当的例子，她是投资银行的先驱。

sentences.c: A case in point is the study by Linda Sax at UCLA, who used data from a large national survey of college freshmen to evaluate the effect of single-sex versus coeducational high schools.
sentences.cn: 加州大学洛杉矶分校的琳达·萨克斯的研究就是一个恰当的例子，她利用了一项全国性的大一新生调查来评估单性别高中和男女混合高中的效果。

sentences.c: A pair of bills sponsored by Massachusetts state Senator Jason Lewis and House Speaker Pro Tempore Patricia Haddad, to ensure "gender parity" on boards and commissions, provide a case in point.
sentences.cn: 马萨诸塞州参议员贾森·刘易斯和众议院临时议长帕特丽夏·哈达德为确保董事会和委员会中的 “性别平等” 而提出的两项议案就是一个很好的例子。

sentences.c: Above all, chairs should be comfortable.
sentences.cn: 首先椅子应该舒适。

sentences.c: He continued to place security above all other objectives.
sentences.cn: 他继续将安全置于其他所有目标之上。

sentences.c: Our goods compete in terms of product quality, reliability and above all variety.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品从质量、可靠性、尤其是多样性来看很有竞争力。

trans.cn: 根据：表示根据某人或某事的陈述、说法或信念。

sentences.c: Everything went according to plan.
sentences.cn: 一切均按照计划进行。

sentences.c: People should pay according to their means.
sentences.cn: 人们应该按照各自的负担能力来消费。

sentences.c: Prices change according to supply and demand.
sentences.cn: 价格根据供应量和需求量而变化。

trans.cn: 对…负有责任；对…做出解释；说明……的原因；导致；（比例）占

sentences.c: How do you account for the fact that unemployment is still rising?
sentences.cn: 你如何解释失业人数仍在增加这个现实？

sentences.c: The gene they discovered today doesn't account for all those cases.
sentences.cn: 他们今天发现的那种基因解释不了所有的那些情况。

sentences.c: The social services account for a substantial part of public spending.
sentences.cn: 社会服务性事业占政府开支的相当大的一部分。

sentences.c: It helps organisms adapt to environmental changes.
sentences.cn: 它帮助生物体适应环境变化。

sentences.c: Farmers already adapt to variable weather by changing their planting schedules.
sentences.cn: 农民已经通过改变种植计划来适应多变的天气。

sentences.c: Some amphibians adapt to arid environments by completing accelerated development with resting stages deep underground.
sentences.cn: 一些两栖动物通过在地下深处的休眠期内完成加速发育以适应干旱环境。

sentences.c: How did you adjust to college life?
sentences.cn: 你是怎么适应大学生活的？

sentences.c: The study speculated, having a white roommate helps academically prepared black students adjust to a predominantly white university.
sentences.cn: 研究推测，对于在学业方面有所准备的黑人学生来说，或许拥有一位白人室友可以帮助他们进行调节，以适应一所白人占主导地位的大学。

sentences.c: It took her a while to adjust to living alone.
sentences.cn: 她过了一段时间才适应独自生活。

sentences.c: We rarely agree on what to do.
sentences.cn: 我们很少在要做的事情上看法一致。

sentences.c: The deal fell apart when we failed to agree on a price.
sentences.cn: 我们在价格上未能达成一致意见，生意吹了。

sentences.c: I value the opinion of my husband and we agree on most things.
sentences.cn: 我重视我丈夫的意见，而且我们在大多数事情上看法一致。

sentences.c: We, the undersigned, agree to...
sentences.cn: 我们，本文件的具名人，同意…

sentences.c: I'll agree to anything for an easy life.
sentences.cn: 只要有安逸舒适的生活我什么都同意。

sentences.c: You must not agree to do it. Don't weaken.
sentences.cn: 你们一定不能同意做这件事。别心软。

sentences.c: I'm inclined to agree with you.
sentences.cn: 我倾向于同意你的观点。

sentences.c: I don't agree with you there.
sentences.cn: 在那一点上，我不敢与你苟同。

sentences.c: I agree with you, as it happens.
sentences.cn: 我恰恰和你意见一致。

sentences.c: We finished 15 minutes ahead of time.
sentences.cn: 我们提前15分钟完成。

sentences.c: Trading was very light ahead of yesterday's auction.
sentences.cn: 昨天的拍卖之前交易很少。

sentences.c: Two boys were ahead of us.
sentences.cn: 有两个男孩在我们前面。

sentences.c: All in all, it's fantastic!
sentences.cn: 总而言之，它很棒！

sentences.c: All in all it had been a great success.
sentences.cn: 总的说来，那是个巨大的成功。

sentences.c: We both thought that all in all it might not be a bad idea.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都认为总的来说这可能不是个坏主意。

sentences.c: He resigned for a variety of reasons.
sentences.cn: 他由于种种原因辞职了。

sentences.c: A variety of heavy industries grew up alongside the port.
sentences.cn: 各种重工业在港口边上兴起并发展起来。

sentences.c: This tool can be used in a variety of ways.
sentences.cn: 这一工具有多种用途。

sentences.c: I like all sports apart from football.
sentences.cn: 除足球外我喜欢所有的运动。

sentences.c: Apart from anything else I was starving.
sentences.cn: 别的不说，我快饿死了。

sentences.c: She keeps herself apart from other people.
sentences.cn: 她与其他人保持距离。

sentences.c: We need to appeal to a wider customer base.
sentences.cn: 我们需要吸引更广泛的客户。

sentences.c: It's a movie that will appeal to the young.
sentences.cn: 这部电影年轻人会感兴趣。

sentences.c: They took their appeal to the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: 他们上诉到了最高法院。

sentences.c: I am continuing to apply for jobs.
sentences.cn: 我在继续申请工作。

sentences.c: Only genuine refugees can apply for asylum.
sentences.cn: 只有真正的难民才能申请政治避难。

sentences.c: She's left it too late to apply for the job.
sentences.cn: 她申请那份工作已为时太晚。

sentences.c: We don't approve of smacking.
sentences.cn: 我们不赞成打孩子。

sentences.c: I don't approve of violence in any shape or form.
sentences.cn: 我不赞成任何形式的暴力行为。

sentences.c: Their parents had a puritanical streak and didn't approve of dancing.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母管教颇严格，不赞成跳舞。

sentences.c: We arrive at a conclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们得出了结论。

sentences.c: We must arrive at a conclusion on what to do.
sentences.cn: 我们必须得到结论要做些什么。

sentences.c: We must weigh one fact with the next to arrive at a conclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把各项事实加以权衡之后才能得出结论。

sentences.c: As a result, services have been drastically reduced.
sentences.cn: 结果，服务被大大减少了。

sentences.c: He made one big mistake, and, as a result, lost his job.
sentences.cn: 他犯了个大错，结果丢了工作。

sentences.c: She died as a result of her injuries.
sentences.cn: 她由于受伤而死亡。

sentences.c: His abilities are not reflective of the team as a whole.
sentences.cn: 他的能力并不代表整个队的水平。

sentences.c: "As a whole," she muses, "the `organized church' turns me off."
sentences.cn: “总的来说，”她若有所思地说，“‘组织严密的教会’让我厌烦。”

sentences.c: The rich benefited from the reforms, not the country as a whole.
sentences.cn: 富人而不是全体国民得益于这些改革。

sentences.c: It only lasted a couple of years, as far as I know.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，它仅维持了几年。

sentences.c: As far as I know, the robot that can sweep the floor was invented in the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，扫地机器人是在20世纪80年代发明的。

sentences.c: As far as I know, he works until midnight every day.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他每天工作到半夜。

word: as far as one is concerned

sentences.c: They may be there forever as far as any one of us is concerned… and forever is a long, long time.
sentences.cn: 就我们任何一个人来说，它们也许会永远存在……永远是很长很长的时间。

sentences.c: One of the challenges for firms in customer migration situations is that the firm may not know when the relationship is over (as far as the customer is concerned).
sentences.cn: 对处于客户迁移情况下的公司的一个挑战是公司不知道关系什么时候结束(就客户而言)。

sentences.c: But as far as the single California mother is concerned, she's only one kind of crazy - baby crazy.
sentences.cn: 这位加利福尼亚的单身妈妈只是一种狂热症，那就是对孩子的疯狂。

sentences.c: Goods, once they have been made, are assumed to move instantly and at no cost from place to place.
sentences.cn: 人们常常假定货物一旦被制造出来，就可以立即从一个地方转移到另一个地方，而不需要任何费用。

sentences.c: You'll be allowed the use of audiovisual equipment at no cost.
sentences.cn: 你可以免费使用视听设备。

sentences.c: The first truly free public library that circulated books to everyone at no cost was started in a small New England town in 1833.
sentences.cn: 1833年，在新英格兰的一个小镇上，第一家免费向所有人提供图书的公共图书馆成立了。

sentences.c: With so much rich interface at one's disposal, only two technical metrics on the client have any impact on the game's server infrastructure: network throughput and latency requirements.
sentences.cn: 尽管界面如此丰富，但是在客户机上只有两个技术指标对游戏的服务器基础结构有影响：网络吞吐量和延迟需求。

trans.cn: 同时；另一方面；与此同时

sentences.c: At the same time she felt a prick on her neck.
sentences.cn: 同时她感到脖子上一阵刺痛。

sentences.c: "We're all talking at the same time."—"Yeah. Sorry."
sentences.cn: “我们都在同时说话。”—“呃，对不起。”

sentences.c: She looked so beautiful, and at the same time so remote.
sentences.cn: 她看上去如此漂亮，但同时又那么孤傲。

sentences.c: There was a stream at the bottom of the garden.
sentences.cn: 花园尽头有一条小溪。

sentences.c: He sat at the bottom of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他坐在楼梯底部。

sentences.c: I found some coins at the bottom of my bag.
sentences.cn: 我在我的手提包底找到了几枚硬币。

sentences.c: He paced back and forth.
sentences.cn: 他来回踱步。

sentences.c: In Taipei buildings rocked back and forth.
sentences.cn: 在台北，建筑物前后摇晃着。

sentences.c: The windshield wipers clacked back and forth.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上的刮雨器来回刮着，发出咔嚓声。

sentences.c: There's nothing to be afraid of.
sentences.cn: 没有什么要害怕的。

sentences.c: There's no need to be afraid of him—he's a big softie.
sentences.cn: 没必要害怕他—他心特好。

sentences.c: They may be afraid of losing you.
sentences.cn: 他们可能害怕失去你。

sentences.c: We don't want to be associated with something as symbolic and hateful as a swastika.
sentences.cn: 我们不想和纳粹十字这样象征明显、代表仇恨的东西联系起来。

sentences.c: He no longer wished to be associated with the party's policy on education.
sentences.cn: 他不再愿意与该党的教育方针认同。

sentences.c: While eye contact may be a sign of connection or trust in friendly situations, it's more likely to be associated with dominance or intimidation in adversarial situations.
sentences.cn: 在友好的情境中，眼神交流可能是一种联结或信任的标志，而在敌对的情况下，它更倾向于与支配或恐吓联系在一起。

sentences.c: Be aware of the terrible strain it can put on a child when you expect the best grades.
sentences.cn: 当你期盼最佳成绩时，要意识到这可能给孩子带来的可怕压力。

sentences.c: Advanced students need to be aware of the importance of collocation.
sentences.cn: 层次较高的学生必须意识到词语搭配的重要性。

sentences.c: As with many technological revolutions, you are unlikely to be aware of it.
sentences.cn: 正如很多技术革命一样，你不太可能意识到它。

sentences.c: Your grade will be based on four papers and a final exam.
sentences.cn: 你的成绩将根据四篇论文和期末考试决定。

sentences.c: Both countries agreed that normal relations would be based on noninterference in each other's internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 两国一致同意正常邦交关系应建立在互不干涉内政的基础上。

sentences.c: Should promotion be based on merit or seniority?
sentences.cn: 提拔一个人应当看业绩，还是看资历？

sentences.c: He'll be bound to find out what the skipping-rope is.
sentences.cn: 他一定会弄清楚跳绳是什么。

sentences.c: This package needs to be bound to a collection ID.
sentences.cn: 这个包需要绑定到一个集合id。

sentences.c: If you started counting, you'd be bound to get to it eventually.
sentences.cn: 如果你从这里开始数，你最后一定会到达那里的。

sentences.c: The British Olympic Association (BOA) has said that to earn a slot, a team must be capable of "a credible performance".
sentences.cn: 英国奥运协会（BOA）声称，队伍要拿得出“可信的成绩”才能取得参赛席位。

sentences.c: Such behavior is regarded as "all too human", with the underlying assumption that other animals would not be capable of this finely developed sense of grievance.
sentences.cn: 这种行为被认为“太人类化了”，其言下之意是，其他动物不可能有这种微妙的愤懑感。

sentences.c: Servers and storage must be capable of resizing without impact to users.
sentences.cn: 服务器和存储必须能够在不影响用户的情况下重新调整大小。

sentences.c: Be careful of the nettles—they sting!
sentences.cn: 小心给荨麻扎着—荨麻有刺！

sentences.c: They had to be careful of floating chunks of ice.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不小心漂浮着的厚冰块。

sentences.c: Be careful of fallen power lines.
sentences.cn: 小心倒下的电线。

sentences.c: Don't be carried away by victory.
sentences.cn: 不要让胜利冲昏了头脑。

sentences.c: However, at night it is easy to be carried away by others.
sentences.cn: 可是当黑夜来临时，还是很容易被有心人背着拿走。

sentences.c: I closed my eyes, letting myself be carried away by my daughter's song.
sentences.cn: 我闭上眼睛，任由女儿的音乐牵引我的思绪。

sentences.c: But it can be difficult to be cooperative with someone we dislike.
sentences.cn: 但可能难以与人合作，我们不喜欢。

sentences.c: Long-living women are also more likely to be sympathetic and cooperative than women with a normal life span.
sentences.cn: 与寿命处于正常范围内的女性相比，长寿女性更有可能具有同情心和合作精神。

sentences.c: Leaders of the SCO observer countries and countries and international organizations that have established cooperative relations with the SCO will also be invited to the summit.
sentences.cn: 上海合作组织观察员国、同上海合作组织建立了合作关系的国家以及国际组织的领导人也将应邀与会。

sentences.c: The wet soil would be covered with extra grounds.
sentences.cn: 潮湿的土壤会被额外的土地覆盖。

sentences.c: The bulletin board at Wilmington's one-stop center used to be covered with job postings.
sentences.cn: 威尔明顿一站式职业中心的布告牌过去贴满了各种招聘广告。

sentences.c: Looking through a magnifying glass, Hanley focussed on the most legible fingerprint, which appeared to be covered with a clear finishing coat, like a varnish.
sentences.cn: 透过放大镜看，汉利将注意力集中到一枚最清晰的指纹上，这枚指纹表面似乎覆盖着一层罩膜，像是一层清漆。

sentences.c: Our work can be compared to a battle.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作好比一场战斗。

sentences.c: A stream can be compared to a development branch.

sentences.c: Again, this can be compared to the standard schema from the W3C.
sentences.cn: 再一次地，我们可以将这一结果与W3C的标准模式进行比较。

sentences.c: Although you can share something with them, you should know that they can never be compared with the friends around you.
sentences.cn: 虽然你可以与他们分享一些东西，但你应该知道，他们永远无法与你周围的朋友相比。

sentences.c: Nothing in the world can be compared with red shoes.
sentences.cn: 世界上没有什么东西能和红鞋相比。

sentences.c: Chris knows that his boss likes Kim's work, and he expects that his work will be compared with hers.
sentences.cn: 克里斯知道他的老板很欣赏金姆的工作表现，他希望他的工作成果也能与她相比肩。

sentences.c: Hilton is building its own hotel there, which you may be sure will be decorated with Hamlet Hamburger Bars, the Lear Lounge, the Banquo Banqueting Room, and so forth ,and will be very expensive.
sentences.cn: 希尔顿正在那里建造自己的酒店，你可以肯定的是酒店会配有哈姆雷特汉堡吧、李尔王休息室、班柯宴会厅等等，而且会非常昂贵。

sentences.c: Type parameters can be decorated with the keywords "In" and "Out.
sentences.cn: 类型参数可由关键字“In”和“Out”修饰。

sentences.c: JPA prescribes that object relationships be decorated with persistence qualities.
sentences.cn: JPA规定对象关系是用持久化特性装饰的。

sentences.c: Infants prepared for baptism should be dressed in pure white.

sentences.c: We must be dressed in uniform at school.
sentences.cn: 在学校我们必须穿制服。

sentences.c: This night twelve men will come: their faces will be black, and they will be dressed in chain armour.
sentences.cn: 今夜，有十二个人会来，他们都脸色漆黑，戴着铁链。

sentences.c: My parents will be disappointed with me if I fail to get into college.
sentences.cn: 如果我考不上大学，我的父母会对我失望的。

sentences.c: But it's a good bet that you be disappointed with the results if you only try.
sentences.cn: 但如果你试过却对结果灰心失望也算是个不错的选择。

sentences.c: The British are supposed to be famous for laughing at themselves, but even their sense of humour has a limit, as the British retailer Gerald Ratner found out to his cost.
sentences.cn: 英国人本应以自嘲著称，但就连他们的幽默感也有限度，英国零售商杰拉尔德·拉特纳在付出一定的代价之后才明白了这一点。

sentences.c: Its building have to be famous for their beauty or their historical importance.
sentences.cn: 这里的建筑物要出名，必须美观，或具有历史意义。

sentences.c: His fans would already be familiar with Caroline.

sentences.c: Any of you happened to be familiar with the Greek word for "sun" by chance?

sentences.c: When children are regarded as vessels to be filled with facts, creativity does not prosper; nor does it when teachers' sole objective is coaching children towards exams.

sentences.c: It would be filled with your special memories.
sentences.cn: 它将充满你特别的回忆。

sentences.c: It doesn't necessarily follow from findings like these that a world without work would be filled with unease.
sentences.cn: 失业的世界并不一定就会像研究发现的那样让人充满不安。

sentences.c: You can be full of energy.
sentences.cn: 你可以充满活力。

sentences.c: When you do sports, you will be full of confidence.

sentences.c: An organization without trust will be full of fear and suspicion.

sentences.c: Be interested in others and they are sure to be interested in you.
sentences.cn: 对别人感兴趣，别人肯定也会对你感兴趣。

sentences.c: He only seems to be interested in personal gain.
sentences.cn: 他似乎只在乎个人的收益。

sentences.c: I thought she might be interested in Paula's proposal.
sentences.cn: 我以为她可能会对保拉的提议感兴趣。

sentences.c: He was rumoured to be involved in the crime.
sentences.cn: 有传言说他卷入了这桩罪行。

sentences.c: He reasserted that all parties should be involved in the talks.
sentences.cn: 他再次声明各方均应参加会谈。

sentences.c: I'm very much afraid that your son may be involved in the crime.
sentences.cn: 我非常担忧（very much afraid）你儿子可能在这罪案中受到牵连。

sentences.cn: 谁会为了使人们能够吃上便宜的小虾，而赞同在渔网中溺死海龟呢？

sentences.c: That neighbourhood used to be jammed with freeway ramps.

sentences.c: Although they may not be as packed as some of the other locales on the list, the Minnesota twin cities are still pretty jammed with nearly 7, 000 people per square mile.

sentences.c: And the campus is jammed with lines of cars and seems to be parking lot instead of an academic institute.

sentences.c: It can be the feeling of jealousy or revenge that starts creeping into your heart.

sentences.c: Be grateful that you have emotions and are able to express them. Be grateful for the feelings of passion, anger, love, jealousy, sorrow, happiness, joy, and contentment.

sentences.c: We beat Roma 7-1, is that enough to be considered destroying an opponent?

sentences.cn: 由于美国较长的周末假期将让交易者提前退出市场，使得交易凌嘞为清淡。

sentences.c: Soon, this becomes a habit, which is hard to break.

sentences.cn: 面包在烤制的时候，碳水化合物会分解成黑碳和水。

sentences.cn: 问：如果我的信息没有分成主题，该怎么办？

sentences.c: Policymakers will probably end up doing this.
sentences.cn: 政策制定者最终很可能会这样做。

sentences.cn: 尽管人们对间隔年存在普遍的误解，但它并不会阻碍学术事业的成功，事实上，它可能会促进学业发展。

sentences.cn: 当霍尔先生说因为下雨他们可以在室内休息时，弗雷迪说：“黑暗中总有一丝光明。”

sentences.c: We have coffee, tea, juice, coke, beer and cocktails.
sentences.cn: 咖啡、茶、果汁、可乐、啤酒和调酒。

sentences.c: Do you have friends?
sentences.cn: 你有朋友吗？

sentences.c: You are not alone because you have friends.
sentences.cn: 你并不会孤单，因为你有朋友。

sentences.c: Since we have friends in Phoenix, we pop in there for a brief visit.
sentences.cn: 因为我们在凤凰城有朋友，所以我们会去那里短暂拜访一下。

sentences.c: Let's have fun!
sentences.cn: 让我们玩得开心！

sentences.c: Let's have fun together!
sentences.cn: 让我们一起去玩耍吧！

sentences.c: Have fun with English!
sentences.cn: 在英语中寻找乐趣！

sentences.c: The dishes in the north and south have something in common.
sentences.cn: 北方和南方的菜肴有一些共同之处。

sentences.c: People usually become friends because they have something in common.
sentences.cn: 人们之所以会成为朋友，是因为他们有共同点。

sentences.c: They have something in common (共性). We call it a balalaika but it's played differently.
sentences.cn: 它们有一些共同点。我们称之为俄式三弦琴，但演奏方式不同。

sentences.c: To my surprise, the twins have nothing in common.
sentences.cn: 令我惊讶的是，这对双胞胎毫无共同之处。

sentences.c: The two have nothing in common.
sentences.cn: 两者毫无相同之处。

sentences.c: Two entirely separate islands, or worlds, might have different languages, and most likely have nothing in common.
sentences.cn: 两个完全相隔的岛或者世界之间，会有不同的语言，并且很有可能毫无相通之处。

sentences.c: My favourite time of the holidays is when the children have torn open their lot and delivered their verdicts and are looking to you for sth else…memories that have nothing to do with things bought.
sentences.cn: 孩子们撕开包装纸检视战利品，表示了好恶之后，望着你要别的东西：这是节日里我最喜欢的一刻……那记忆和买来的东西毫无关系。

sentences.c: We don't often have time to talk.
sentences.cn: 我们常常没有时间谈话。

sentences.c: I only have time for a snack at lunchtime.
sentences.cn: 中午，我的时间只够吃点心。

sentences.c: I wouldn't have time to scout the area for junk.
sentences.cn: 我不会有时间在那个地区找废物。

sentences.c: B have difficulty(in)doing sth.
sentences.cn: “做……有困难”，固定用法。

sentences.c: You'll need to keep a clear head for your interview.
sentences.cn: 你面试时需要保持清醒的头脑。

sentences.c: He was too trusting—or, to put it another way , he had no head for business.
sentences.cn: 他太轻信人了—或者换个说法，他没有商业头脑。

sentences.c: Her spectacles were propped up on her gray head for safety.
sentences.cn: 为了安全起见，她把眼镜架在灰白的头上。

sentences.c: I help out with the secretarial work.
sentences.cn: 我帮助做秘书工作。

sentences.c: Regulars at his local bar have set up a fund to help out.
sentences.cn: 他的当地酒吧的常客们已经设立了一项基金来帮忙解决困难。

sentences.c: Sometimes they are willing to help out students with projects like yours.
sentences.cn: 有时他们愿意帮助学生完成像你的这种项目。

sentences.c: The three IT managers hold a meeting.
sentences.cn: 三家花店的 IT 经理进行了一次面谈。

sentences.c: We discussed whether we should hold a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论了是否要开一个会。

sentences.c: Why not to study under that tree and hold a meeting?
sentences.cn: 为什么不去那棵树下学习再开个讨论会呢？

sentences.c: Although its current products are based on single drugs, the company does hold a license to develop dual-drug nanocells.
sentences.cn: 虽然公司目前的产品都属单一药物性质，但公司持有开发双药物纳米细胞的许可证。

sentences.c: The "business departments" as mentioned in these Provisions refers to the business departments which are established by insurance companies and hold a License for Operating insurance business.
sentences.cn: 本规定所称营业部，是指由保险机构设立的持有《经营保险业务许可证》的营业部。

sentences.c: Officials stated that the Fromms require a license to hold meetings in their home.
sentences.cn: 官员指出弗洛姆家人需要一个许可证在自己的家中举行聚会。

sentences.c: It's good to hold back tears during a tense business discussion.
sentences.cn: 参考译文：在进行紧张的商业讨论时抑制住泪水是比较好的。

sentences.c: Everyone in the small observation post was failing to hold back tears.
sentences.cn: 在这个小小观察站的所有人都忍不住掉下眼泪。

sentences.c: Hearing her daughter's success, she could not hold back tears of joy.
sentences.cn: 听到女儿成功了，她禁不住流下了喜悦的泪水。

sentences.c: We hold hands, looking up to happiness.
sentences.cn: 我们紧握双手，仰望幸福。

sentences.c: Would you just hold hands and swear that we—Oh no, that wouldn't do for this.
sentences.cn: 你能不能举起手来，发誓我们——哦，不，这可不行。

sentences.c: But hold hands madly?
sentences.cn: 但他们会疯狂地牵手么？

sentences.c: We hold the record for the longest migration of any animal in the world!
sentences.cn: 我们保持着世界上动物迁徙距离最长的记录！

sentences.c: Arsenal hold the record for Fielding the most players in an England team.
sentences.cn: 阿森纳保持了为英格兰国家队贡献最多球员的纪录。

sentences.c: United hold the record for the most FA cup victories and Charity shield wins.
sentences.cn: 曼联还保有赢得最多足总杯和慈善盾的记录。

sentences.c: I was put in charge of the office.
sentences.cn: 他们让我负责管理这个办公室。

sentences.c: Send it to whoever is in charge of sales.
sentences.cn: 把这寄给负责销售的人。

sentences.c: He was the officer in charge of operations.
sentences.cn: 他是负责指挥作战行动的军官。

sentences.c: Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
sentences.cn: 难民为寻找安全四处逃奔。

sentences.c: He ranges far and wide in search of inspiration for his paintings.
sentences.cn: 他四处漫步，寻找绘画的灵感。

sentences.c: They trekked from shop to shop in search of white knee-high socks.
sentences.cn: 他们疲惫地奔波于一家又一家商店，寻找高到膝盖的白色长筒袜。

sentences.c: The sandy beach was in sight.
sentences.cn: 那片沙滩映入眼帘。

sentences.c: There was no one in sight.
sentences.cn: 一个人也看不见。

sentences.c: At last we came in sight of a few houses.
sentences.cn: 最后，我们看到了几座房屋。

sentences.c: In spite of great peril, I have survived.
sentences.cn: 尽管危险巨大，我还是活了下来。

sentences.c: In spite of my outward calm I was very shaken.
sentences.cn: 尽管表面看似镇静，我内心却非常慌乱。

sentences.c: He survived in spite of suffering grievous injuries.
sentences.cn: 尽管遭受重伤，他仍然活下来了。

sentences.c: This ensures that the state can be recovered from either the scheduling node or the execution node in event of failure.
sentences.cn: 这样就确保了当调度节点或者执行节点出现故障时那些状态可以恢复。

sentences.c: The bank has agreed to give an immediate refund in the unlikely event of an error being made.
sentences.cn: 银行已同意倘若出现不太可能的错误便立即退款。

sentences.c: In view of the weather, the event will now be held indoors.
sentences.cn: 由于天气的缘故，这项赛事将在室内进行。

sentences.c: In view of the fact that Hobson was not a trained economist his achievements were remarkable.
sentences.cn: 鉴于霍布森非科班出身的经济学家这一事实，他的成就是很了不起的。

sentences.c: Residents were warned not to be extravagant with water, in view of the low rainfall this year.
sentences.cn: 鉴于今年降雨量少，居民被告诫不得浪费用水。

sentences.c: His chances do not seem good in view of the fact that the Chief Prosecutor has already voiced his public disapproval.
sentences.cn: 鉴于首席检察官已公开表示反对这一事实，他的机会看起来不好。

sentences.c: In general, a plain carpet makes a room look bigger.
sentences.cn: 一般来讲，纯色的地毯使房间显得更大。

sentences.c: In general, Japanese cars are very reliable and breakdowns are rare.
sentences.cn: 日本汽车通常是很可靠的，发生故障的情况极少。

sentences.c: I know how it works in general terms.
sentences.cn: 我大致知道其中的运作原理。

sentences.c: Dave was in a hurry to get back to work.
sentences.cn: 戴夫急于回去工作。

sentences.c: We were in a hurry so we had to make do with a quick snack.
sentences.cn: 我们很匆忙，只好将就着来了点小吃。

sentences.c: Kate was in a hurry to grow up, eager for knowledge and experience.
sentences.cn: 凯特急切地想长大，渴望获得知识和经验。

sentences.c: The proceedings of the inquiry will take place in private.
sentences.cn: 调查行动将秘密进行。

sentences.c: What consenting adults do in private is their own business.
sentences.cn: 成年人私下做什么是他们自己的事情。

sentences.c: The appeal was heard in private.
sentences.cn: 这件上诉案不公开审理。

sentences.c: In return, we drove John back home.
sentences.cn: 返回途中，我们开车把约翰送回家了。

sentences.c: Can I buy you lunch in return for your help?
sentences.cn: 感谢你帮忙，我请你吃午饭好吗？

sentences.c: We made too many concessions and we got too little in return.
sentences.cn: 我们作出了太多让步，而得到了太少回报。

sentences.c: The building is in danger of collapsing.
sentences.cn: 这栋建筑有垮塌的危险。

sentences.c: They were more in danger of having their pockets picked than being shot at.
sentences.cn: 他们遭遇扒窃的危险大于遭受枪击。

sentences.c: The economy is in danger of collapse unless far-reaching reforms are implemented.
sentences.cn: 除非实施影响深远的改革，否则经济就有崩溃的危险。

sentences.c: I insist on paying for the damage.
sentences.cn: 我坚持要赔偿损失。

sentences.c: We insist on the highest standards at all times.
sentences.cn: 我们始终坚持最高标准。

sentences.c: They insist on sticking to the letter of the law.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持严守法律的字面意义。

sentences.c: I try not to let work interfere with my personal life.
sentences.cn: 我尽量不让工作干扰我的私生活。

sentences.c: She never allows her personal feelings to interfere with her work.
sentences.cn: 她从不让她的个人感情妨碍工作。

sentences.c: Smoking and drinking interfere with your body's ability to process oxygen.
sentences.cn: 吸烟和喝酒妨碍身体对氧的吸收能力。

sentences.c: Wage increases must be in line with inflation.
sentences.cn: 工资的增长必须与通货膨胀率一致。

sentences.c: Annual pay increases will be in line with inflation.
sentences.cn: 每年加薪幅度将与通货膨胀挂钩。

sentences.c: An eclipse happens when the earth and moon are in line with the sun.
sentences.cn: 地球和月亮与太阳处在一条直线上，日食就发生了。

sentences.c: In my view things won't change.
sentences.cn: 在我看来形势不会改变。

sentences.c: In my view, you are a menace to the public.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，你对公众是一个威胁。

sentences.c: In my view this book would deprave young children.
sentences.cn: 我认为这本书会腐蚀儿童。

sentences.c: Strawberries are cheaper when they're in season.
sentences.cn: 草莓在上市季节很便宜。

sentences.c: These are the dog days; watermelons are just in season.
sentences.cn: 现在是伏天，西瓜正当令。

sentences.c: There are a few ideas around on how to treat fillies and mares in season.
sentences.cn: 关于如何对待发情期的小母马和母马有几种观点。

sentences.c: We sleep out under the stars, and eat our meals in the open air.
sentences.cn: 我们露宿在星空下，在户外用餐。

sentences.c: They again ate outside, for Clara had to be in the open air all day, if possible.
sentences.cn: 他们又在外面吃饭了，因为克拉拉如果她可以的话，一整天都会待在露天里。

sentences.c: In zoos, animals are no longer kept in cages, but in great spaces, either in the open air or in enormous greenhouses.
sentences.cn: 在动物园里，动物不再被关在笼子里，而是生活在广阔的空间里：要么是露天的环境，要么是巨大的温室。

sentences.c: They live in the end house.
sentences.cn: 他们住在最后的那座房子。

sentences.c: In the end, wiser counsels prevailed.
sentences.cn: 高明的建议最终占了上风。

sentences.c: Everything will come right in the end.
sentences.cn: 一切到最后都会好起来的。

sentences.c: In the event of the machine not operating correctly, an error code will appear.
sentences.cn: 如果机器运转不正常，就会出现错误代码。

sentences.c: Sheila will inherit everything in the event of his death.
sentences.cn: 他一旦故去，所有财产都由希拉继承。

sentences.c: Airbags protect the driver in the event of a severe frontal impact.
sentences.cn: 汽车若遇到正面猛烈撞击，安全气囊可以保护驾车者。

sentences.c: There were cheers for each of the women as they spoke in turn.
sentences.cn: 女士们依次发言时，每一位都得到了喝彩。

sentences.c: Feeding each other in turn.
sentences.cn: 相互轮流喂食。

sentences.c: We look after him in turn.
sentences.cn: 我们依次照顾他。

sentences.c: Can you keep a secret ?
sentences.cn: 你能保守秘密吗？

sentences.c: Can you keep a secret?
sentences.cn: 你能保守秘密吗？

sentences.c: Could you keep a secret, if I told you one?
sentences.cn: 如果我告诉你一个秘密，你能保密吗？

sentences.c: Professor Smith recently persuaded 35 people, 23 of them women, to keep a diary of all their absent-minded actions for a fortnight.
sentences.cn: 史密斯教授最近说服了35人，其中23人是女性，让他们把自己在两周内所有心不在焉的行为记在日记里。

sentences.c: Professor Smith recently persuaded 35 people, 23 of them women, to keep a diary of all their absent minded actions for a fortnight.
sentences.cn: 史密斯教授最近说服了35人，其中23人是女性，在两周内让他们把自己所有心不在焉的行为记在日记里。

sentences.c: Eleanor began to keep a diary.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺开始记日记了。

sentences.c: You'd keep a promise and not tell?
sentences.cn: 你要答应我不要告诉任何人。

sentences.c: They want to keep a promise to balance the federal budget by 2011.
sentences.cn: 他们想在2011年之前恪守平衡联邦预算的承诺。

sentences.c: Failing to keep a promise leads to an emotional reaction of shame, embarrassment, or disappointment.
sentences.cn: 未遵守承诺导致一种情绪反应的耻辱，尴尬，或失望。

sentences.c: His wisdom is to keep awake in order to sleep well.
sentences.cn: 他的智慧在于，想要睡眠好，保持清醒很重要。

sentences.c: A blogger named Shao Mingbo wrote, "I will keep awake tonight to see who can be the first lucky follower of the account."
sentences.cn: 一位署名邵明波（音译）的网友写道：“我今晚不睡了，一定要看看谁是这个微博的第一位幸运追随者。”

sentences.c: You will either have more of the right kind of energy to help your focus, or you'll need to work extra hard just to keep awake.
sentences.cn: 那么你就需要食用更多的适当种类的能量来帮助你提升注意力，或者你需要额外的工作来保持你的清醒。

sentences.c: The most difficult part was to keep balance.
sentences.cn: 最困难的部分是保持平衡。

sentences.c: As a matter of the utmost urgency, the world has to keep balance between over population and finite resources.
sentences.cn: 当务之急是，世界必须在过剩的人口和有限的资源之间保持平衡。

sentences.c: Rather than invite legal disputes, however, it might instead go for a comprehensive conversion and keep balance-sheets straight.
sentences.cn: 与其引来法律争议，它不如在更加广泛的领域完成兑换，维持收支平衡。

sentences.c: No one wants to keep company with someone who always looks upset.
sentences.cn: 没有人喜欢和经常很沮丧的人来往。

sentences.c: Keep company with me and you'll learn to live freely and lightly.
sentences.cn: 与我同行，你将生活的自由而又轻松。

sentences.c: Keep company with me and you'll learn to live freely and lightly." Matthew 11:28-30 (MSG)
sentences.cn: 紧紧的跟着我，你必学会如何自由轻松的活着。

sentences.c: The fish are among the hardest to catch and keep in captivity.
sentences.cn: 该鱼很难捕捉，很难抑制束缚。

sentences.c: Some fish could not be keep in captivity , because they belong to the sky.
sentences.cn: 有的鱼是永远都关不住的，因为它们属于天空。

sentences.c: Conservationists said that with none in zoos and almost nothing known about how to keep them in captivity, if the species vanish in the wild they will be extinct.
sentences.cn: 环保人士表示，动物园没有一头武广牛，也没有一个人知道如何将它们圈养。如果这一物种在野外消失，便意味着它们从此灭绝。

sentences.c: Here's a five dollar bill—please keep the change.
sentences.cn: 这是一张五元的钞票—零钱就不用找了。

sentences.c: Mona: Keep the change, Joe.
sentences.cn: 蒙纳：请不用找钱了，乔。

sentences.c: "Keep the change," he said generously.
sentences.cn: “零钱不用找了，”他慷慨地说。

sentences.c: I will lay the foundation of the roof with the marl.
sentences.cn: 我要用这些泥灰苫背屋顶。

sentences.c: Research at home and abroad and carding of correlative theories lay the foundation of this study.
sentences.cn: 国内外实践调研和相关理论的梳理奠定了本研究的基础。

sentences.c: Then, time process division idea is raised to lay the foundation of the constitution and analysis of steady state energy function in power grid.
sentences.cn: 简要论述了电力系统时间过程划分的思想，为电力系统网络的稳态能量函数的构造与分析打下了基础。

sentences.c: I had to lay out a fortune on a new car.
sentences.cn: 我只好花一大笔钱买了辆新车。

sentences.c: My job is to lay out the text and graphics on the page.
sentences.cn: 我的工作是设计页面上的正文和图表。

sentences.c: I'd like to lay out my reasoning.
sentences.cn: 我想陈述一下我的理由。

phrases.cn: 布图设计；布局设计；布线设计

sentences.c: A poor diet will ultimately lead to illness.
sentences.cn: 糟糕的饮食终将导致疾病。

sentences.c: Insults can lead to the incitement of violence.
sentences.cn: 侮辱会导致对暴力的煽动。

sentences.c: He pulled away, extending his lead to 15 seconds.
sentences.cn: 他甩开了对手，领先优势扩大到了15秒。

sentences.c: I leave behind two trees: one with silver grey hair, the other still freshly green.
sentences.cn: 我留下两棵树，一棵长着银灰色的头发，另一棵还鲜绿。

sentences.c: Sometimes, the traces of breadcrumbs you leave behind are the only clues that you have an eating disorder.
sentences.cn: 有时，你留下的面包屑痕迹是暗示你患有饮食失调症的唯一线索。

sentences.c: Burning the forest just once can leave behind enough black carbon to keep the soil fertile for thousands of years.
sentences.cn: 森林仅仅燃烧一次就能留下足够的黑碳，来保持数千年土壤肥沃。

sentences.c: I know the Lord will look after him.
sentences.cn: 我知道上帝会照顾他的。

sentences.c: It makes sense to look after yourself.
sentences.cn: 照顾好你自己是明智的。

sentences.c: Your baby depends on you to look after yourself properly while you are pregnant.
sentences.cn: 你的宝宝靠你怀孕时好好照顾你自己。

sentences.c: They look for foods that are low in calories.
sentences.cn: 他们寻找低热量食物。

sentences.c: We all need to look for ways to reduce our carbon footprint.
sentences.cn: 我们都需要寻找减少我们碳足迹的办法。

sentences.c: He went out with an unlicensed shotgun to look for the intruders.
sentences.cn: 他带着一把没有执照的霰弹枪出去寻找闯入者。

sentences.c: I look forward to hearing from you.
sentences.cn: 盼望着收到你的信。

sentences.c: I now look forward to going back to work as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 我现在盼望尽快回到工作中。

sentences.c: We look forward to strengthening still further our already close co-operation with the police.
sentences.cn: 我们期待进一步加强和警方现有的密切合作。

sentences.c: We all look up to him.
sentences.cn: 我们都很尊敬他。

sentences.c: I look up to the policeman who helped me out.
sentences.cn: 我尊敬那位帮助我摆脱困境的警察。

sentences.c: I'll look up to you.
sentences.cn: 我会尊敬你的。

sentences.c: You can lose a job by wearing an undershirt or simply a little too much clothing.
sentences.cn: 穿了件汗衫或者衣服多穿了一点点可能会让你失去一份工作。

sentences.c: The best way to lose a job is just not to care. When you do not care, it shows in everything you do.
sentences.cn: 丢掉工作的最好方法就是不在关心。当你不关心的时候，它会显示在你做的每件事中。

sentences.c: For most, this is not the time to switch companies... or lose a job. But many will be forced to, through no fault of their own.
sentences.cn: 但是许多人将被迫因为并非自己的错误而跳槽或失业。

sentences.c: It expects to lose money again in 2011.
sentences.cn: 预计2011年它还会亏钱。

sentences.c: We can afford to lose money -even a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 我们可以承受金钱损失——即便是很多钱。

sentences.c: Events that require expensive prizes can lose money.
sentences.cn: 一个活动如果需要昂贵的奖金会损失很多资金。

sentences.c: The real winners in sport are those who know how to persevere and to behave with dignity-whether they win or lose a game.
sentences.cn: 在体育运动中，真正的赢家是那些知道如何坚持和表现得有尊严的人——无论他们在比赛中是赢还是输。

sentences.c: You can’t lose a game if your not conceding.
sentences.cn: 只要你不丢球你就不会输球。

sentences.c: I have completely forgotten how it feels like when the rockets lose a game!
sentences.cn: 我已经完全忘记了，当火箭队输掉一场比赛，那是什么样的感觉了。

sentences.c: Khan also makes his classes as short as 10 to 15 minutes so that students won't lose interest.
sentences.cn: 可汗还把他的课程缩短到10到15分钟，这样一来，学生就不会失去兴趣。

sentences.c: Once you lose interest in what you're doing, you can take a break from it.
sentences.cn: 一旦你对你正在做的事情失去了兴趣，你可以暂停并休息一下。

sentences.c: Don't lose interest now.
sentences.cn: 别失去兴趣。

sentences.c: She's starving herself to try to lose weight.
sentences.cn: 她试图通过节食来减肥。

sentences.c: People will lose weight when they slim down with a friend.
sentences.cn: 人们若和朋友一起减肥，就会减轻体重。

sentences.c: He reacted testily to the suggestion he should lose weight.
sentences.cn: 有人建议他减肥，对此他很恼火。

sentences.c: I've no use for people who don't make an effort.
sentences.cn: 我厌恶那些不努力的人。

sentences.c: I make an effort to be on time when I meet my friends.
sentences.cn: 当我和朋友见面时，我会努力做到准时。

sentences.c: France has promised to make an effort to rebuild Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris.
sentences.cn: 法国承诺努力重建巴黎圣母院。

sentences.c: Love can make a difference.
sentences.cn: 爱可以改变一切。

sentences.c: Small actions make a difference.
sentences.cn: 小的行动会带来改变。

sentences.c: That's when APL can make a difference.
sentences.cn: 这就是 APL 能够发挥作用的时候。

sentences.c: It's easy to make a mistake.
sentences.cn: 犯错误很容易。

sentences.c: I'd always played a defensive game, waiting for my opponent to make a mistake.
sentences.cn: 我总是打防守战，等着对手出错。

sentences.c: Someone will make a mistake for certain and take the wrong ones.
sentences.cn: 一个人总会会犯错误，走错路的。

sentences.c: They don't always make a noise.
sentences.cn: 它们并不总是吵闹。

sentences.c: It's very impolite to make a noise.
sentences.cn: 制造噪音是很不礼貌的。

sentences.c: Soon, a little girl came with her mother and wanted a toy that could make a noise.
sentences.cn: 不久，一个小女孩和她的妈妈走了过来，想要一个会发出声音的玩具。

sentences.c: Ok, shall I make a coffee first?
sentences.cn: 好的，我要先冲咖啡吗？

sentences.c: You get into the office, make a coffee, chat to the person who sits next to you.
sentences.cn: 你走进办公室，泡了杯咖啡，和坐在你旁边的人聊天。

sentences.c: Its made up of a special blend of Robusta and Arabica beans, which has been specifically created to make a coffee with an unusually aromatic and delicate flavour.
sentences.cn: 阿拉伯咖啡和罗步斯塔咖啡混合调制而成，本品甜美雅致且别具风味。

sentences.c: Ahem, can I make a suggestion?
sentences.cn: 呃哼，我可以提个建议吗？

sentences.c: Might I make a suggestion?
sentences.cn: 我可以提个建议么？

sentences.c: Can I make a suggestion ?
sentences.cn: 我提个建议好吗？

trans.cn: 做出决定；做决定；作出决定

sentences.c: We can't make a decision based on hearsay and guesswork.
sentences.cn: 我们不能根据传言和猜测作决定。

sentences.c: Check out the lie of the land before you make a decision.
sentences.cn: 要摸清情况后再作决定。

sentences.c: I've asked to see all the facts and figures before I make a decision.
sentences.cn: 我已要求在看到所有的确切信息后再作决定。

sentences.c: Solid and descent appearance of a brush font can make a significant and valuable contribution to many designing projects.
sentences.cn: 对许多设计项目来说，画笔字体实体雅致的外观可作出至关重要且颇有价值的贡献。

sentences.c: NextGen will allow planes to make what is called a continuous-descent approach (CDA), essentially letting them turn off their engines, saving tons of fuel and reducing pollutants.
sentences.cn: 次世代可允许飞机采取被称国持续降落进场（CDA）的动作，从而事实上关闭引擎，节约燃料，减少污染物排放。

sentences.c: To make matters worse: it's easy to hit top speed on a steep descent-and the faster you move, the harder each foot strikes the ground, and the more pounding the muscles endure.
sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是：落差大，很容易达到最高速度- - -您的速度越快，双脚撞击地面越厉害，肌肉承受的冲击越大。

sentences.c: Many people want to make a fortune by doing nothing, which is the reason why the gambling industry thrives.
sentences.cn: 许多人都想要不劳而获赚大钱，这就是博彩行业蓬勃发展的原因。

sentences.c: The notion of success haunts us: we spend million every year reading about the rich and famous, learning how to "make a fortune in real estate with no money down" and "dressing for success".
sentences.cn: 成功的概念一直萦绕着我们：我们每年花费百万阅读有关富人和名人的书籍，学习如何“在房地产上赚大钱而不用首付”，以及“如何打扮可以成功”。

sentences.c: YouTube's founders and investors will make a fortune.
sentences.cn: YouTube的创建者和投资者们会发大财。

sentences.c: On no account should we make a joke of others' shortcomings because everyone has his own disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 我们绝不应该拿别人的缺点开玩笑，因为每个人都有缺点。

sentences.c: I wish I had your courage, Michael, to make a joke of it like that.
sentences.cn: 我真希望能有你那般勇气，迈克尔，那样拿它当玩笑。

sentences.c: Have you found a way to get yourself to make a joke?
sentences.cn: 你找到了一个让自己开玩笑的方法吗？

sentences.c: To get an idea of what work you would like to do, make a list of your interests and a list of your skills.
sentences.cn: 为了了解你想做什么工作，先列出你的兴趣和技能。

sentences.c: Let's make a list of possible speakers, in order of preference.
sentences.cn: 咱们按优先顺序列出一份可能请到的发言者名单。

sentences.c: You should make a list of all the jobs you have to do and prioritize them.
sentences.cn: 你应该把所有必须做的事都列出来，并按轻重缓急排个顺序。

sentences.c: It's not a very secure way to make a living.
sentences.cn: 以此谋生终非长久之计。

sentences.c: Many farmers have to depend on subsidies to make a living wage.
sentences.cn: 许多农民不得不依靠补助来维持基本的生活需要。

sentences.c: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.
sentences.cn: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。

sentences.c: I need to make a phone call.
sentences.cn: 我需要打个电话。

sentences.c: I have to make a phone call.
sentences.cn: 我得打个电话。

sentences.c: Wait there for a minute. I have to make a phone call.
sentences.cn: 在那儿等会儿，我得打个电话。

sentences.c: After lunch, they drove to their summer villa, in order to make arrangements there for winter, and I went with them.
sentences.cn: 吃过午饭后，他们驾车去他们的夏季别墅，为去那儿过冬做安排，我跟他们一起去了。

sentences.c: I'll make arrangements for you to be met at the airport.
sentences.cn: 我会安排人到机场接你。

sentences.c: She gave me the phone number for the nearest pharmacy so I could make arrangements with our pediatrician to call in prescriptions.
sentences.cn: 她给了我最近的药店的电话号码，这样我就可以和我们的儿科医生联系并且拿到药方。

sentences.c: He thinks it's clever to make fun of people.
sentences.cn: 他觉得拿别人开玩笑显得聪明。

sentences.c: It's cruel to make fun of people who stammer.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑口吃的人是很不人道的。

sentences.c: Boys came to make fun, but stayed to paint.
sentences.cn: 男孩们前来取笑，但却留下来画画。

sentences.c: I knew that Adam and Chen were going to make fun of me in front of John, and that John would decide that he'd rather be buddies with them.
sentences.cn: 我知道亚当和陈会在约翰面前取笑我，这样约翰就会宁愿跟他们玩。

sentences.c: Those guys will make fun of me.
sentences.cn: 那些人会取笑我。

sentences.c: They always try to make fun of me.
sentences.cn: 他们总是开我的玩笑。

sentences.c: Simon finds it hard to make friends with other children.
sentences.cn: 西蒙感到难以和其他孩子交朋友。

sentences.c: It was hard for a police officer to make friends outside the force.
sentences.cn: 一名警官在警察部门之外交朋友很难。

sentences.c: She found it difficult to make friends because of her natural reserve.
sentences.cn: 她因天性矜持很难交到朋友。

sentences.c: Make notes and prepare.
sentences.cn: 做笔记并做准备。

sentences.c: You make notes, I presume.
sentences.cn: 我想你会做笔记的。

sentences.c: Try to make notes in class and revise them after class.
sentences.cn: 试着在课堂上做笔记并在课后复习笔记。

sentences.c: What started as a benign "fun" way to socialize, grew into a professional way to maintain one's network and make new connections, the report notes.
sentences.cn: 社交网络最初只是为了好玩儿，但后来成为维系个人关系网和结交朋友的专业途径。

sentences.c: This kind of thinking, he found, is not the way to make one's self popular with other birds.
sentences.cn: 他发现，像他这样的想法，在同类中是吃不开的。

sentences.c: Decorate water scene, actually can make public individual character, can put flying imagination, what advocate like Shui Guifang in that way, can a kick in one's gallop!
sentences.cn: 布置水景，其实可以张扬个性，可以放飞想象，就像水贵坊所倡导的那样，可以异想天开！

sentences.c: Provided you are modest, you'll surely make progress.
sentences.cn: 只要虚心，就会进步。

sentences.c: The medical community continues to make progress in the fight against cancer.
sentences.cn: 医学界继续在抗癌斗争中取得进步。

sentences.c: Humans can not make progress without dreams.
sentences.cn: 没有梦想，人类就不能进步。

sentences.c: Parents make rules to help children grow up healthily.
sentences.cn: 父母制定规则以帮助孩子们健康成长。

sentences.c: Teachers make rules to help students learn and stay safe.
sentences.cn: 老师制定规则以帮助学生学习并保持安全。

sentences.c: Parents and teachers are strict, but I know they make rules to help us.
sentences.cn: 尽管父母和老师都很严格，但我知道他们制定规则是为了帮助我们。

sentences.c: Make sure the wires don't touch.
sentences.cn: 一定不要让金属线搭在一起。

sentences.c: Make sure that you are not underinsured.
sentences.cn: 确保你的保险是足额的。

sentences.c: Make sure that you defrost it completely.
sentences.cn: 确保将其彻底除霜。

sentences.c: I think there's a bus at 8 but you'd better call to make certain.
sentences.cn: 好像8点有一班公共汽车，不过你最好打电话弄清楚。

sentences.c: Photography did indeed make certain kinds of painting obsolete — the daguerreotype virtually did away with the portrait miniature.
sentences.cn: 摄影确实使某些种类的绘画过时了——银版照相几乎使微型肖像消失了。

sentences.c: You'll have to leave soon to make certain of getting there on time.
sentences.cn: 你得快点出发，好确保准时到达那里。

sentences.c: Make time to take stock.
sentences.cn: 找时间去总结下。

sentences.c: If we don't want to live in a pigpen, we have to make time to clean up the room often.
sentences.cn: 如果不想住在猪圈里，我们就不得不经常挤出时间整理房间。

sentences.c: While reading a recent conversation on Facebook between two family members, I caught sight of these words: "You have time for whatever you make time for."
sentences.cn: 最近我在脸书上看到两个家庭成员之间的对话，我注意到这样一句话：“你有时间做你想做的事。”

trans.cn: 能够出席；准时到达；获得成功

sentences.c: I can't make it, unfortunately.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我来不及。

sentences.c: I couldn't make it out at all.
sentences.cn: 我完全不能明白它。

sentences.c: He's hoping to make it big on TV.
sentences.cn: 他正期待着在电视上干出个名堂来。

sentences.c: In this case, you cannot make the change.
sentences.cn: 在这个示例中，您无法进行这项更改。

sentences.c: Q: Why has the Bank decided to make the change?
sentences.cn: 问：为什么世行决定作出这种改变？

sentences.c: To make sense, these figures should not be looked at in isolation.
sentences.cn: 这些数据不应孤立起来看，否则就没有意义。

sentences.c: On the face of it that seems to make sense. But the figures don't add up.
sentences.cn: 乍一看，那好像讲得通。但是数字对不上。

sentences.c: This sentence doesn't make sense.

sentences.c: Irresolution means reluctance or an inability to make up one's mind.
sentences.cn: 优柔寡断指犹豫不决，举棋不定不愿或不能决定。

sentences.cn: 第一章导论部分主要说明论文立意并介绍文章的逻辑体系。

sentences.c: Look upon this story as a means of limbering up one's senses, one's attitude and one's mind to make them pliable and receptive.
sentences.cn: 这个故事可以让人的知觉、态度和心智变得柔韧、灵活和敏感，更容易接受新的事物。

sentences.c: Get your skates on or you'll miss the bus.
sentences.cn: 快点，要不你就赶不上公共汽车了。

sentences.c: We'd better leave now or we'll miss the bus.
sentences.cn: 我们最好现在就走，不然就赶不上公共汽车了。

sentences.c: Set out ahead of time, and you are much less likely to miss the bus.
sentences.cn: 提前出发，你就能不太可能会错过巴士了。

sentences.c: Those who deride the proposal for opening up the courts to family lawsuits miss the point.
sentences.cn: 那些嘲笑为家庭诉讼开放法庭的提议的人没有抓住要点。

sentences.c: But such complaints miss the point.
sentences.cn: 不过，这种抱怨没说到重点。

sentences.c: But perhaps such rationalisations miss the point.
sentences.cn: 但或许这种理性化算漏了这一点。

sentences.c: Sometimes it's for the best that we miss an opportunity.
sentences.cn: 有时失去一次机会对我们来说是最好的。

sentences.c: After that, never miss an opportunity to tell the truth.
sentences.cn: 之后，不要错过任何一个说出真相的机会。

sentences.c: And never miss an opportunity to accept wisdom being spoken into yours.
sentences.cn: 而且千万不要错过接受谈及自己才智的机会。

sentences.c: What this means is that if you miss a class you need to get notes, and so you should get them from a friend or from the person sitting next to you.
sentences.cn: 这也就意味着，如果你落下了一节课，你就要看笔记，你可以向朋友或者身边的同学借来看。

sentences.c: A friend said to me yesterday "If you don't miss at least one plane a year you're arriving at the airport too early!"
sentences.cn: 一个朋友昨天告诉我“如果你一年都没错过航班，那么你到机场太早了！”

sentences.c: Organised by her younger sister, Pippa, who will be maid of honour at the royal wedding, Miss Middleton’s private party was understood to have taken place at the home of a friend.
sentences.cn: 这场派对由米德尔顿的妹妹皮帕组织。皮帕也是威廉与凯特王室婚礼的伴娘。据称，米德尔顿的私人派对在一位友人的家中举行。

sentences.c: The author can report other people's results which more or less agree with hers.
sentences.cn: 作者可以报道与自己的观点或多或少一致的别人的成果。

sentences.c: I've more or less finished the book.
sentences.cn: 我差不多已经读完这本书了。

sentences.c: The conference is more or less over.
sentences.cn: 会议大致结束了。

sentences.c: For group decision-making to work well, you need a way to sort through the various options they propose: and you need a mechanism to narrow down these options.
sentences.cn: 要想让团队决策发挥作用，你需要有一种方法来梳理他们提出的各种方案，你还需要一种机制来缩小这些选择的范围。

sentences.c: What's happened is that the new results narrow down the possibilities.
sentences.cn: 现有的情况是，新的结果缩小了可能性的范围。

sentences.c: If you can narrow down this list, you should.
sentences.cn: 如果可以缩减列表，应该尽量缩减。

sentences.c: The 30 percent figure may be no more than a guesstimate.
sentences.cn: 30%这一数字可能只是个大约的估计。

sentences.c: There is room for no more than three cars.
sentences.cn: 这地方只能停放三辆车。

sentences.c: They make no more than a mutter of protest.
sentences.cn: 他们不过是小声抗议了一下。

sentences.c: No doubt I had blundered again.
sentences.cn: 不用说我又犯了个蠢错。

sentences.c: There seemed to be no doubt about it.
sentences.cn: 此事似乎毫无疑问。

sentences.c: He is in no doubt as to what is needed.
sentences.cn: 他对需要些什么心中有数。

sentences.c: A lot of people will object to the book.
sentences.cn: 很多人会反对这本书。

sentences.c: I really object to being charged for parking.
sentences.cn: 我非常反对收停车费。

sentences.c: Working people everywhere object to paying taxes.
sentences.cn: 各地劳动人民都反对纳税。

sentences.c: Shares rose, on average, by 38%.
sentences.cn: 股值平均上涨了38%。

sentences.c: 400 people a year die of this disease on average.
sentences.cn: 平均每年有400人死于这种疾病。

sentences.c: On average each report requires 1,000 hours to prepare.
sentences.cn: 平均每份报告需要1000个小时来准备。

sentences.c: It'll fit if you stand it on end.
sentences.cn: 如果把它竖着就放得进去了。

sentences.c: He is a wonderful companion and we can talk for hours on end.
sentences.cn: 他是个极好的伙伴，我们可以连续谈上几个小时。

sentences.c: Wet books should be placed on end with their pages kept apart.
sentences.cn: 弄湿的书应该竖着放置，书页分开。

sentences.cn: 新体育馆的设计图展示在图书馆里。

sentences.c: Self-driving shuttles and solar cars were on display at the 2014 show.
sentences.cn: 无人驾驶汽车和太阳能汽车在这次2014年展览上展出。

sentences.c: The latest models will be on display at the motor show.
sentences.cn: 最新的车型将会在这次汽车展上展出。

sentences.c: He's on duty twenty-four seven.
sentences.cn: 他不分昼夜地天天上班。

sentences.c: Who's on duty today?
sentences.cn: 今天谁值班？

sentences.c: There will only be a skeleton staff on duty over the holiday.
sentences.cn: 假期将只留必需的少数职员值班。

sentences.c: The president declined to deliver the speech himself, on account of a sore throat.
sentences.cn: 那位总统由于嗓子疼拒绝亲自发表演讲。

sentences.c: He felt guilty on account of his former anger at the kind gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他觉得很内疚，因为他以前对这位善良的绅士生过气。

sentences.c: The fact was, he could not refuse the request, on account of the dwarf's third gift.
sentences.cn: 事实上，由于小矮人的第三个礼物，他无法拒绝这个请求。

sentences.cn: 在去…的路上。

sentences.c: On one's way back on her way back Jane said nothing.
sentences.cn: 在回来的路上珍妮一句话也没有说。

sentences.c: There is a way of encountering error while on one's way to the truth.
sentences.cn: 在追求真理的道路上出错的机会原是常有的。

sentences.c: Each guest has her own single room, or shares, on request, a double room.
sentences.cn: 每位客人都有自己的单人房间，经要求也可共用双人间。
